name: Bee Game But Everytime You Get a Honeycomb It Gets Faster
name_original: Bee Game But Everytime You Get a Honeycomb It Gets Faster
description:
Beefriend your bee friends and fly through the vast ocean in this Cool New Game by VeggieStew for Global Game Jam 2017!

Controls:

Move your cursor, and the bee follows you

Right Mouse Button - Scatter/Unscatter your swarm of bees

Left Mouse Button - Rise up from the ocean, or dive into it if your swarm is scattered
